description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2dlau","text":"This protocol describes isolation and culture of basal cells from the olfactory epithelium of mice. The process involves serial enzymatic treatment of dissected olfactory epithelia and subsequent plating in commercial airway medium with dual SMAD inhibitors. The resulting cultures express the horizontal basal cell markers CK5 and CK14.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ep27","text":"Dissect olfactory mucosa from nasal septum   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b25gr","text":"Induce anesthesia via intraperitoneal injection of 0.15 mL euthanyl, followed by\ndecapitation. Peel off skin and excise the eyes and the jaw. Disinfect the skull with 70% ethanol and carefully bisect along the sagittal plane, maintaining a 1 mm distance from the interfrontal suture. Transfer the larger segment of the skull under a dissection microscope, dissect a 1 mm distal section from the nasal bone. Carefully remove the nasal bones and collect the olfactory epithelium surrounding the septal cartilage into Hank's Balanced Salt Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64nu0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3j0h4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8357A2E02CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a2udf","text":"Mince the tissue in   dissection medium, add   10x Collagenase/Hyaluronidase and transfer to a 15 mL falcon.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8m54f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.7","error":false,"guid":"799773702CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"72FEE9D02CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"537uv","text":"Briefly vortex falcon and rotate at   for 1h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ln6p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7CD783402CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rp49","text":"Triturate pellet in   TrypLE for 2 min and add   cold HBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7cspi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"D51870502CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"D747AC602CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89mdr","text":"Spin down at   for 5 min and resuspend cells in 1 mL warmed dispase and 50 uL DNase 1. Triturate for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b178l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"350","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9CE3B4B02CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7po2","text":"Add   cold HBSS and filter through 40 um cell strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d1dqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"D1BD85802CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckrs2","text":"Spin down at   for 5 min, discard supernatant, resuspend in HBC medium with   ROCK inhibitor Y27632.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":76,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sp2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"350","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"ACA3FE502CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C28446302CB711EEAB6709977948D5BD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pdva","text":"Plate on PDL and laminin coated wells, one mouse septum on 1.9 cm2 (1 well in a 24-well plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dct5e","text":"10. Refresh medium the next day without ROCK inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ablgg","text":"11.  Feed every 2 days. Passage with accutase and do not use any other cell dissociation products such as TryplE of trypsin. Cultures are homogenously CK5+ after 3 passages.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse Olfactory Horizontal Basal Cell Culture
